channel.title: My server uptime - HELP MODS
channel.description:
hello, i have rsps running , and advertised in the page, but it has gone down due to restart like 2 secs but the mopar cheked its status in that time, so they recorded it of, and untill now it has 95% online time, but after it it has running online over 2 months and it goes so slow as hell up , it goes like 1% per month , so wth? im running it since 8 months or over and still 95-96% online, but it is 24/7 it doesnt change!
so the whole time over 10 months now, not over 5 mins downtime, and it wont go up , it change like 1% every month to go up, and it change fast to go down so wtf?

item.title: My server uptime - HELP MODS
item.dc:creator: @Anc13nts253 Anc13nts253
item.description:
@Anc13nts253 wrote:

[quote=“insane pkz247, post:1, topic:378163”]hello,
i have rsps running , and advertised in the page, but it has gone down due to restart like 2 secs but the mopar cheked its status in that time, so they recorded it of, and untill now it has 95% online time, but after it it has running online over 2 months and it goes so slow as hell up , it goes like 1% per month , so wth? im running it since 8 months or over and still 95-96% online, but it is 24/7
it doesnt change!

so the whole time over 10 months now, not over 5 mins downtime, and it wont go up , it change like 1% every month to go up, and it change fast to go down so wtf?[/quote]
It pretty much stays that way.

My server went down from 100% to 98% after like 10 minutes of downtime, then for a whole month it was online without any downtime and got up to only 99%, it’s pretty much impossible to get back to 100%

Read full topic
